name: Slackin
description: Let people invite themselves to your Slack channel

SLACK_ORG.description: The name of your Slack organization (**this**.slack.com)

SLACK_API_TOKEN.description: Slack API token (you can find it on api.slack.com/web)

SLACK_CHANNEL.description: Name of a single guest channel to invite them to (leave blank for a normal, all-channel invite)
